error.title: Error!
error.400_e: This error occurred because an invalid input was detected. Please make sure you have entered the required input correctly.
error.429_e: This error occurred because a number of requests were being received by the server. Try again in a few minutes.
error.500_e: The internal server has stopped working for an unexpected reason.

login.title: Login
login.login_kkutu: Sign in to use KKuTu Online.

kkutu.title: Rule the Word! KKuTu Online
kkutu.meta_desc: Online ending, front talking, consonant quizzes, crossword puzzles, even typing competition! Be the King of Vocabulary at the end of the line.
kkutu.serverRefresh: Recall the list of servers again.
kkutu.websocketUnsupport: This game is supported in Internet Explorer (10), Chrome (16), Firefox (11), Opera (12.1) and Safari (6) and above! Please update your browser.
kkutu.dictionarySupport: 사전 정보 제공:WordNet, 우리말샘
kkutu.PLAYTSHelp: 본 서버는 PlayTS 연맹의 도메인, 서비스를 사용하고 있습니다.
kkutu.welcomeTestServer: You have reached the test server. This server may close without notice.
kkutu.error_full: Server limit personnel exceeded... Please log on in a minute!!!
kkutu.error_401:
Your account is only allowed to watch games.
Click the login button in the upper right corner to log in!
kkutu.error_402:
Your account is only accessible to the potato server.
Click the login button in the upper right corner to log in!
kkutu.error_404: I can't find a room to enter. Do you create a new room?
kkutu.error_406: You are not allowed to enter the room again after being forced out.
kkutu.error_408: You have reached your account from another location and have been disconnected here.
kkutu.error_409: The account is already in contact.
kkutu.error_410: You have been excluded from the game by an administrator.
kkutu.error_411:
You can't start a game alone.
If you'd like to play the game alone, click Practice or use the Invite to AI feature in Invite.
kkutu.error_413: You must select at least one topic.
kkutu.error_414: Improper subject detected. Please select the topic again.
kkutu.error_415: This game type is not allowed for off-the-bot.
kkutu.error_416:
The room is already in the middle of a game.
Shall we enter the room and watch the game?
kkutu.error_417: The account does not exist in the lobby.
kkutu.error_419: The user has already received an invitation.
kkutu.error_421:
Profile management is available after logging in.
Click the login button in the upper right corner to log in!
kkutu.error_423:
You can use the store after logging in.
Click the login button in the upper right corner to log in!
kkutu.error_424:
The user is not connected to the switch or is not connected to this server. (If your name has a space, please enter it except for spaces.)

Users:
kkutu.error_425: There is no one to reply
kkutu.error_426: It is not possible to resell items that are being fitted.
kkutu.error_428: The Observer automatically exits the room after the game.
kkutu.error_432: Room configuration is invalid. Please reset the number of players.
kkutu.error_433: Room configuration is invalid. Please reset the number of rounds.
kkutu.error_435: You can combine up to six pieces of text at a time.
kkutu.error_436: You can combine only the words that have been preregistered.
kkutu.error_437: He was ejected from the room for three consecutive rounds of turning.
kkutu.error_440: Guests, unconfirmed members, and young people under the age of 16 are restricted from midnight to 6 a.m.
kkutu.error_441: We are unable to read your date of birth. Please make sure the date of birth of the logged-in account is public and log in again at Kwutu. You can hide your date of birth after you have verified yourself.
kkutu.error_442: Connection to server terminated because there was no response for more than 5 minutes.
kkutu.error_443: Your administrator has restricted your use of chat to that account.
kkutu.error_444:
Your game access to that account has been restricted by your administrator.
Reasons for restriction:
kkutu.error_445: You have successfully verified yourself. Thank you.
kkutu.error_450: The user is not connected to KKuTu or is not connected to this server.
kkutu.error_451:
Community functions are available after logging in.
Click the login button in the upper right corner to log in!
kkutu.error_452: You can no longer add friends.
kkutu.error_453: You cannot add a guest account as a friend.
kkutu.error_454: Waiting for response to add friends request.
kkutu.error_455: You can delete only friends who are not connected.
kkutu.error_500: Server check or update in progress.
kkutu.turnError_402: One-shot words cannot be used from the first turn.
kkutu.checkAgeAsk:
In the last episode, we are entering the date of birth to confirm our identity. The date of birth entered is used only for identification and processing of internal information and is not disclosed to third parties.
Do I proceed with my identification?
kkutu.checkAgeNo: The input value is not valid. Please check again.
kkutu.checkAgeInput1: Please enter the year of birth. (4 digits)
kkutu.checkAgeInput2: Please enter month of birth date. (1-12)
kkutu.checkAgeInput3: Please enter the date of birth. (1 to 31)
kkutu.checkAgeSure: Is the date of birth entered below correct? The date of birth entered is used only for identification and processing of internal information and is not disclosed to third parties.
kkutu.checkAgeCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel and postpone your verification?
kkutu.sureHandover: Do you really take over the room?
kkutu.linkWarning: You clicked the link. This service is not responsible for any damage caused by moving to the link. Continue?
kkutu.trollWarning: Two consecutive turns failed. If you don't make the third turn, you will be ejected from the room.
kkutu.modex0:
It's an English vocabulary that starts with two or three digits.
apple → please → secret
kkutu.modex1:
It's an English vocabulary that starts with a single digit.
apple → elephant → time
kkutu.modex2:
It's a three-letter Korean vocabulary that starts with a single digit.
강아지 → 지렁이 → 이발소
kkutu.modex3:
It's a Korean vocabulary that starts with a single digit.
그물 → 물레방아 → 아저씨
kkutu.modex4: Use only the subject and initial consonants given to you to infer what the word is.
kkutu.modex5: Inflate the appropriate Korean words into the cross-shaped blanks.
kkutu.modex6: Enter a given Korean word as quickly as possible.
kkutu.modex7: Enter a given English word as quickly as possible.
kkutu.modex8:
It's a Korean vocabulary that ends with one digit in front.
고구마 → 이실직고 → 맏이
kkutu.modex9: We use Korean vocabulary to match the given initial consonants.
kkutu.modex10: Korean vocabulary for a given topic.
kkutu.modex11: Put English vocabulary for a given topic.
kkutu.modex12: Korean words are extracted from randomly blended characters.
kkutu.modex13: They pick out English words from randomized words.
kkutu.modex14: Explain and match the two to ten words in Korean. 경고: 모바일은 정상플레이 불가
kkutu.modex15: Describe and match the four to sixteen words in English. 경고: 모바일은 정상플레이 불가
kkutu.subJamsu: All participants prepared it. If you don't start the game within 30 seconds, you will automatically leave the room.
kkutu.masterJamsu: All participants were set up but did not start the game, so they were ejected from the room.
kkutu.hasMaster: is the master of the room.
kkutu.hasKicked: I was forced out of the room.
kkutu.inputChat: Please enter it in the chat window below.
kkutu.soon: The game will start in a few minutes!
kkutu.sureExit: Stop playing the game and exit?
kkutu.explManner: Disables the use of herbal words.
kkutu.explInjeong: Acknowledge the use of special words.
kkutu.explMission: If the word contains a specific character, then you get an additional score.
kkutu.explProverb: It appears on the screen one sentence instead of a word.
kkutu.explStrict: You can enter only noun words except dialect, old words, and North Korean.
kkutu.explSami: It goes back and forth between three and two words.
kkutu.explNo2: Prevent the use of two-letter words.
kkutu.explUnlimited: Adjust the length of the words in the picture quiz to infinity.
kkutu.explRandomMission: 매 턴 미션이 랜덤하게 바뀝니다. 미션을 활성화해야 작동됩니다. 미션의 경험치 배율을 80%로 바꿉니다. (미션과 같이 사용해야함)
kkutu.explNoReturn: 끝말잇기, 앞말잇기에서 앞뒤가 같은 단어를 사용하지 못하게 하거나, 끄투에서 제시어로 끝나는 단어를 금지시킵니다. 경험치 배율은 90%입니다.
kkutu.explRandomTurn: 순서가 무작위로 돌아갑니다. 같은 유저가 연속으로 걸릴 수도 있습니다. 경험치 배율은 130%입니다.
kkutu.explUnknownWord: 사전에 없는 단어만 입력 가능합니다. 보상을 받을 수 없습니다.
kkutu.explReturns: 이미 사용한 단어를 다시 사용 가능하게 합니다. 경험치 배율은 25%입니다.
kkutu.explAbcMission: 미션이 가~하만 나옵니다. 미션의 경험치 배율을 80%로 바꿉니다. (미션과 같이 사용해야함)
kkutu.explInjPick: Please select a topic to use in the game.
kkutu.kickVoteNotice: If you do not respond in time, consider yes.
kkutu.kickVoting: Voting for 's forced exit is in progress.
kkutu.kickDenied: The vote force exit has been rejected.
kkutu.invited: You received a request for participation from Room. Do you accept?
kkutu.guestExit:
Did you enjoy watching?
Click the login button in the upper right corner to play now!
kkutu.sureConsume: Do you really use this item?
kkutu.dressWhichHand: Which hand is fitted to? (OK: left, Cancel: right)
kkutu.cfTray: Click a piece of letter to create a word.
kkutu.cfBlend: You can fuse three meaningless pieces of text. Press the Combination button to continue the fusion process.
kkutu.cfSureCompose: Is it really a combination? All the character pieces used as assembly materials disappear.
kkutu.cmd_r: (/r) Press the ready button. If you are a room master, press the Start button.
kkutu.cmd_f: (/f) Opens a window containing the recent 100 conversations.
kkutu.cmd_ee: (/답, /ee Content) Sends the whisper to the most recent sender.
kkutu.cmd_wb: (/wb Target) Ignore the target's whisper. If you re-enable this command while it is ignored, the override will be disabled.
kkutu.cmd_shut: (/shut Target) Block all conversations on the target. If you use this command again while it is blocked, it will be unblocked.
kkutu.attemptFriendAdd: You received an additional request from to add a friend. Do you accept?
kkutu.friendEditMemo: Set a note for this friend (maximum 50 characters)
kkutu.friendAddRes_no: declined request to add a friend.
kkutu.friendAddNotice:
Please enter the ID number of the user who will send the additional friend request.
The star number can be obtained using the command /id.
kkutu.friendSureRemove: Do you really delete this friend? If you delete it, you will also be removed from the other person's friends list.
kkutu.quickStatus: Number of rooms of that type:
kkutu.dying: The connection will be terminated after 10 seconds due to a problem with the channel you are currently connected to. I'm terribly sorry for the inconvenience.
kkutu.blocked: The relevant function is temporarily unavailable due to excessive message transmission.
kkutu.paybackHelp: Hold down the Ctrl key and select the item to resell.
kkutu.surePayback:
Do you really sell this item again? Re-published items cannot be recovered.
Extended Recovery Ping:
kkutu.alreadyGot: I think it's already owned.
kkutu.purchased: Purchased successfully. You can view purchased goods by clicking the My Info > Manage Profiles button at the bottom left of the screen.
kkutu.okgExpl:
끄투에서 사람들과 함께 게임 플레이 시간 10분을 달성할 때마다
경험치와 핑을 더욱 많이 얻을 수 있는 를 획득할 수 있습니다!
kkutu.okgNotice: You've won an OKT Buff by achieving 10 minutes of game play time!
kkutu.okgCurrent: Overlay of OKT buffs at this time (max 18):
kkutu.okgExpired: OKT Buff Overlay initialized after midnight.
kkutu.replayError: This is not a valid replay file.
kkutu.wpDesc1: Please enter the words you wish to add.
kkutu.wpDesc2: Once a word is added, you get your experience reward!
kkutu.wpFail_401: Failed - the word must be a noun.
kkutu.wpFail_405: Failed - word not found on wiki.
kkutu.wpFail_406: Failed - The word does not meet the criteria for the application.
kkutu.wpFail_429: Failed - Please try in a few minutes.

game/fates.title: Fate
game/fates.fcRule1: 제한된 시간 안에 W키를 눌러 목표 카드와 색을 맞추세요! 기회는 단 한 번입니다!
